events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has a large scratch on the screen and does not function properly.
The reported issue was identified as a product defect due to scratch and malfunctioning components.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product support specialists to assist you further.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your product. I’m here to help you resolve this problem.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and describe any other functional problems you are experiencing?
I’ve attached several photos showing the scratch on the screen, and the device won’t turn on despite charging it fully.
Thank you for the photos. We will arrange a replacement for you free of charge and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the defective product.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt assistance. I appreciate the replacement offer.
We have processed your replacement order and sent you an email with the shipping label and return instructions.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and everything is working as expected.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly. Thanks again for your help resolving this quickly.
Thank you for confirming the resolution. We are closing your case now, but please reach out if you need any further assistance.
